p: The assay was then evaluated with 190 animal samples. Among 81 poultry swab samples, we identified 25 (30.9 %) positive for CoV. All 81 poultry swab samples had previously tested positive for influenza A by real-time RT-PCR [ 9]. Sequencing of the CoV positive samples identified one avian CoV, two duck CoVs and 22 infectious bronchitis viruses (IBVs) (Table S4). Among 109 tested pig samples, one (0.92 %) tested positive for CoV. This sample was confirmed as positive for transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV) by Sanger sequencing.
